languages.text: [Возвысить голос] "Вы утратили бдительность! Попали в сети врага! Вас использовали! Обратили в изменников Человечества! Вы все виновны перед Императором!"
[Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"
languages.original_text: [Возвысить голос] "Вы утратили бдительность! Попали в сети врага! Вас использовали! Обратили в изменников Человечества! Вы все виновны перед Императором!"

languages.text: [Stimme erheben] "Ihr wart nicht wachsam! Ihr seid dem Feind in die Falle getappt! Sie haben Euch benutzt ... Euch zu Verrätern an der Menschheit gemacht! Ihr seid vor dem Imperator allesamt schuldig!"
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: [Stimme erheben] "Ihr wart nicht wachsam! Ihr seid dem Feind in die Falle getappt! Sie haben Euch benutzt ... Euch zu Verrätern an der Menschheit gemacht! Ihr seid vor dem Imperator allesamt schuldig!"

languages.text: [Élever la voix] « Vous avez baissé la garde ! Vous êtes tombés dans le piège de l'ennemi ! Ils vous ont utilisés pour faire de vous des traîtres à l'humanité ! Vous êtes tous coupables aux yeux de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: [Élever la voix] « Vous avez baissé la garde ! Vous êtes tombés dans le piège de l'ennemi ! Ils vous ont utilisés pour faire de vous des traîtres à l'humanité ! Vous êtes tous coupables aux yeux de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: [Levantar la voz] «¡Habéis bajado la guardia! ¡Habéis caído en la trampa del enemigo! ¡Os han utilizado, os han convertido en traidores a la Humanidad! ¡Sois todos culpables a ojos del Emperador!».
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: [Levantar la voz] «¡Habéis bajado la guardia! ¡Habéis caído en la trampa del enemigo! ¡Os han utilizado, os han convertido en traidores a la Humanidad! ¡Sois todos culpables a ojos del Emperador!».

languages.text: [声を荒げる]「お前が油断したのだろう！敵の罠にはまったのだ！奴らに利用され…人類の裏切り者にされたのだ！お前たちは皇帝の前において有罪である！」
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: [声を荒げる]「お前が油断したのだろう！敵の罠にはまったのだ！奴らに利用され…人類の裏切り者にされたのだ！お前たちは皇帝の前において有罪である！」

languages.text: [提高嗓音]“你们放松了警惕！你们落入了敌人的圈套！他们利用了你们，把你们变成了人类的叛徒！在帝皇面前，你们所有人都是罪人！”
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"

traits.locale_text: [提高嗓音]“你们放松了警惕！你们落入了敌人的圈套！他们利用了你们，把你们变成了人类的叛徒！在帝皇面前，你们所有人都是罪人！”

languages.text: [Sesini yükselt] "Teyakkuzu elden bıraktınız! Düşmanın tuzağına düştünüz! Sizi kullandılar, onların eliyle İnsanlığa ihanet ettiniz! İmparator'un nazarında hepiniz suçlusunuz!"
languages.original_text: [Raise your voice] "You have let your guard down! You have fallen into the enemy's trap! They have used you — turned you into traitors to Humanity! You are all guilty before the Emperor!"
